title: EOS Price Jumps on News of EOSIO 1.0  Release, $50 mln Fund to Support ‘Ecosystem’
content: Blockchain software developer Block.one has released version 1.0 of their open-source blockchain protocol, EOSIO, according to an official blog post published today, June 2. The software is a platform designed for building applications at both the enterprise and “community-driven” levels.  According to the company’s post, Block.one does not guarantee that the EOSIO software will perform “as intended” or “will be free of errors, bugs or faulty code,” claiming that developers implement EOSIO at they own risk.  Continue Reading on Cointelegraph
